                                <normalization me:level="facs dipl norm">
                                        <p>This manuscript text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised. The normalised text given here is according to Jakob Benediktsson's edition <title>Íslendingabók:Landnámabók (Íslenzk Fornrit I, Reykjavík 1986)</title></p>
                                </normalization>

                                      </p>
                              </div>
